sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SECURITY_PRINCIPAL ( PRINCIPAL_ID, DOMAIN_ID ,PARENT_ID,SHORT_PATH,FULL_PATH,PRINCIPAL_NAME,CLASSNAME,IS_MAPPING_ONLY,IS_ENABLED,THEME,SITE_NAME,DEFAULT_PAGE,SUB_PAGE,PRINCIPAL_TYPE,PRINCIPAL_ORDER,CREATION_DATE,MODIFIED_DATE,PRINCIPAL_INFO01,PRINCIPAL_INFO02,PRINCIPAL_INFO03,PRINCIPAL_DESC ) VALUES ( #principalId#, #domainId# ,#parentId#,#shortPath#, CONCAT( '/group/' , #shortPath#),#principalName#,'com.saltware.enview.security.InternalGroupPrincipalImpl',0,1,#theme#,#siteName#,#defaultPage#,#subPage#,'G',(SELECT count(PRINCIPAL_ID) FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL a WHERE PARENT_ID=#parentId#),#creationDate#,#modifiedDate#,#principalInfo01#,#principalInfo02#,#principalInfo03#,#principalDesc# )
